Blog.post: To be honost, I fucking hate the internet. World Wide Fuck. AHAHAHA AHAHAHA AHAHAH > : (

One thing I can't stand: lesbians. one thing I REALLY can't stand: lesbians who hate the internet! I think they only hate the internet because they find it hard to type through their lover's vaginal membrane. Maybe if they stopped FISTING the girl, and TYPED, they would have better luck! that is, if they weren't all fat with sausage fingers incaipable of typing less than 3 letters at once..
One thing I love about the internet is google!!! If you need to find anything, !1, give it a whirl!! http://www.google.com ! i wonder why more people don't know about it!?1
Boy howdy, I love the internet! but i don't like people who don't > : (. they need to get off 28 k modem and onto cable love train!!! LOL!

This will be my last post. I am lying.
I will make a shared blog where I post pictures with two other fellows.
The show is a good show, I guess. I want it to be an hour of him turning on and off the lights while locking the door and walking in circles.
I don't watch the show Monk, but i am watching it now.
That post was pointless.
The rumor about the man in the closet isn't true. I'm sorry.
This will be the blog I put effort into. Since nobody reads any blogs on this site, and nobody makes comments, this doesn't matter. I say this begrudgingly. a ha. ha ha. ha ha ha. ha ha ha ha.
if one is expected to cross the street in such an amount of time, one must also like chilidogs. a ha. ha ha. ha ha ha. hee.
I wasted 4 blogs. I'm sorry. WTF
